item.title: PGP Keys
item.description: If you’d like to contact me via encrypted email, or confirm the identity of an email I’ve sent you, you can do so using the following PGP keys: tillery@tillery.fyi

TL;DR: Tillery has deep-dive knowledge in training and education, AppSec, and exploitation development. They also love threat modeling. And corgis. Tillery has been an educator in one form or another longer than just about any other professional or intellectual pursuit. Graduating with both Maths and Computer Science (with concentrations in teacher’s ed, HPC, and Data Science) in undergrad, they started their post-baccalaureate life teaching maths in public schools, but that didn’t last.
